Text: One Million Years B.C.:  The film was made by Hammer Film Productions and Seven Arts, and is a remake of the Hollywood film "One Million B.C." (1940).
Triplets:<One Million Years B.C.
2:
--------------------
Text: One Million Years B.C.:  It recreates many of the scenes of the earlier film, such as an "Allosaurus" attacking a child in a tree.
